messages.content:
summarize this as a one line "gap" analysis for the module that we are turning more sustainable oriented, frame it as a suggested area of improvement in it's "greenification": [[[**2. User Research**User Persona DevelopmentLacks business efficiency and risk factors related to climate● User persona ● Empathy mapMarket Research & Consumer BehaviorNo integration of operational risks due to climateExtreme User InterviewsMisses operational challenges of businesses in resource-limited environmentsEmpathy MappingDoes not address efficiency-driven decision-making in consumer behaviorRisk & Adaptability DiscussionLacks structured discussion on changing market conditionsResearch Plan (Do, Look, Listen)Misses opportunity to connect efficiency with operational research]]]
keep it to one line and terse

messages.content: Critical Gap: Module lacks integration of climate-driven operational risks and resource efficiency considerations across user research methods and business analysis frameworks.

content.text: Critical Gap: Module lacks integration of climate-driven operational risks and resource efficiency considerations across user research methods and business analysis frameworks.
